record.id: field.name="active" and file.name="prodCatalogCategory" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: active
record.file.name: prodCatalogCategory

brief.brief: Active or not. If selected (set to true), indicates that the Product Catalog Category is active.

detail.detail: When it is set to inactive, the system checks whether it is referenced by any product catalogs. If yes, a warning message appears and it remains as active.
If no, it can be set to inactive. Then, when defining product catalog category in the product catalog form, this category is not available for selection.
